member.summary: Adds a new key to the section

member.summary: Adds a new section to the child sections

member.summary: Returns a System.Boolean value indicating whether the specified key exists
member.returns: Returns true if the key exists, otherwise returns false

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfSection.ContainsSection(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a System.Boolean value indicating whether the specified section exists
member.returns: Returns true if the section exists, otherwise returns false

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfSection.RemoveKey(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes one or more keys from the section using the specified name
member.param: The name of the key(s) to remove
True to remove all keys matching the specified name, otherwise false to remove only a single instance

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfSection.RemoveSection(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Removes one or more sections from the child sections using the specified name
member.param: The name of the section(s) to remove
True to remove all sections matching the specified name, otherwise false to remove only a single instance

member.name: T:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder
member.summary: Class used to create and build Xdf strings

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder class

member.name: F:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.m_Buffer
member.devdoc: Buffer used to store the xdf string when using the Write methods

member.name: F:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.m_CurrentDepthLevel
member.devdoc: Private field that stores the level of depth in the current xdf string Example: 0 SectionName:Begin 1 ChildName:Begin 2 Key=A 2 Key=B 1 ChildName:End 0 SectionName:End The depth level also determines the amount of indent spacing used for each depth Example: 0 m_CurrentDepthLevel * m_IndentSpacing = 0 spaces 1 m_CurrentDepthLevel * m_IndentSpacing = 4 spaces 2 m_CurrentDepthLevel * m_IndentSpacing = 8 spaces And so on

member.name: F:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.m_UnclosedSections
member.devdoc: Stack used to store a collection of sections that have not been closed by calling WriteEndSection()

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the stream and clears the buffer to start a new Xdf string

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.ToString
member.summary: Returns the xdf string in the buffer

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.WriteKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Writes the specified key and its associated value to the buffer

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.WriteKey(BitFlex.Xdf.XdfKey)
member.summary: Writes the specified to the buffer

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.WriteBeginSection(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the beginning of a new section to the buffer

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.WriteEndSection
member.summary: Writes the closing tag for an open section to the buffer

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.WriteSection(BitFlex.Xdf.XdfSection)
member.summary: Writes the specified to the buffer

member.name: P:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfBuilder.IndentDepth
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of spacing in each depth level during formatting

member.returns: Returns the that was read, if any

member.summary: Reads all contained sections in the xdf string recursively
member.param: The xdf string that contains the Xdf Section to be read
member.returns: Returns the that was read, if any

member.name: M:BitFlex.Xdf.XdfReader.ValidateSection(System.String)
member.devdoc: Validates an Xdf section to determine whether its format is valid
